description: Notes of tobacco mingle with exploding raspberry tones. Great with steak, burgers and mild cheeses.
title: Habersham
Montaluce
description: Medium dark in color and with varietally true aromas of blackberries, cocoa, eucalyptus and bell pepper. It has stout tannins and a full mouth feel that leads to a long, smooth finish. This wine will age very well for years to come.

title: Peter Cellars
description: This lively rose, made from predominantly the south block of our pinot noir,vineyard  has fragrant aromas of fresh strawberries and orange zest, with wisps of cherry blossom. The flavors are soft and round.

title: NV CaliW Blend
description: Hints of Black licorice and spice.

title: Homewood
description: An amazing port with aromas and flavors of dark skinned summer time fruits that you eat over the sink. Pair it with a chocolate raspberry torte and your favorite vanilla ice cream
